awtube.cia402#

Utils to work with the CIA402 state machine.

class awtube.cia402.CIA402MachineState(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)#

Bases: Enum

States of the CIA402 Machine

FAULT = 'FAULT'#
FAULT_REACTION_ACTIVE = 'FAULT_REACTION_ACTIVE'#
NOT_READY_TO_SWITCH_ON = 'NOT_READY_TO_SWITCH_ON'#
OPERATION_ENABLED = 'OPERATION_ENABLED'#
QUICK_STOP = 'QUICK_STOP'#
READY_TO_SWITCH_ON = 'READY_TO_SWITCH_ON'#
SWITCHED_ON = 'SWITCHED_ON'#
SWITCH_ON_DISABLED = 'SWITCH_ON_DISABLED'#
UNKNOWN = 'UNKNOWN'#
awtube.cia402.device_state(status_word) → CIA402MachineState#

Convert a status word into a CIA402MachineState.

awtube.cia402.transition(state, control_word, fault_reset=True) → int#

Return next step used to go to operational

awtube.errors#

Defines Errors and Exceptions on the user(AWTube) side.

exception awtube.errors.AWTubeErrorException(operation_error_type: int = 0, message: str = '')#

Bases: Exception

Raised when theres an error on the library side.

property type: AwtubeError#

Return OperationError type

DISSCONNECTED = 2#
NONE = 0#
exception awtube.errors.CancelledTask#

exception awtube.errors.HeartbeatFailure#

Bases: Exception

Raised when heartbeat is not sent in predefined time slot.

class awtube.errors.OperationError(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)#

Bases: IntEnum

Types of OperationError defined by GBC.

HLC_HEARTBEAT_LOST = 1#

NONE = 0#
OPERATION_NOT_ENABLED = 2#
TOOL_INDEX_OUT_OF_RANGE = 4#
exception awtube.errors.TelemetryLoss#

Bases: Exception

Raised when telemetry is not recieved in predefined time slot.

exception awtube.errors.ThreadLoopNotRunningError#

Bases: Exception

awtube.observers#

Defines the Observer Interface used to implement the observer pattern.

class awtube.observers.Observer#

Bases: ABC

The Observer interface declares the update coroutine, used by subjects. These types of object are used as wrappers of objects that would get updated frequently, thus they hold a timestamp also.

property payload#

Return last payload stored.

property timestamp#

Return timestamp of when payload was last updated.

abstract update(message: object)#

Receive update from subject and update payload.

class awtube.observers.StatusObserver#

Bases: Observer

Observes the status field in the ws stream and keeps a Status object as payload

update(message: str)#

Receive update from subject and update payload.

class awtube.observers.StreamObserver#

Bases: Observer

Observes the stream field in the ws stream and keeps a StreamStatus object as payload

update(message: str)#

Receive update from subject and update payload.

class awtube.observers.TelemetryObserver#

Bases: Observer

The Observer interface declares the update coroutine, used by subjects.

update(message: str)#

Receive update from subject and update payload.
